name: A game about tickets. And carnivals. And Life.
name_original: A game about tickets. And carnivals. And Life.
description:
Controls:

W - Move up

S - Move Down

Space - Fire

Left Click - Click on things, allowing you to select them.

This game is... well... a game about tickets. You play as a ticket machine who is tasked with making a successful carnival. The game has you purchasing rides for your carnival, then attempting to make enough money to maintain those rides. Each ride costs money to purchase, and maintain, and all have different upgrades. This is the offline version of the game. In order to gain access to leaderboards, go here. Keep in mind that this is an early beta, and changes will be made over time. If you have any bugs to report, issues, or just have questions in general, don't be afraid to post a comment.
